desc: Our thick, reflective house numbers and mailbox numbers are unique, adhesive backed, and easy to apply. Withstands weather extremes. The aggressive adhesive means no drilling, nails or screws.

layout.text: Thick, Reflective House and Mailbox Numbers

FREE USPS 1ST CLASS SHIPPING
Numbers adhere with exterior grade pressure sensitive adhesive and withstand all types of weather extremes. They are a composite product made of exterior gasket-like material and engineering grade reflective vinyl. Our four, five and six inch House Numbers are 1/8 inch thick and two and three inch Mailbox Numbers are 1/16 inch thick.
